title: Lesson 03 - One Minute German
description: In lesson 3 of One Minute German you will learn how to say you speak a little German. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute German at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com.
